templates.name: Smooth/Curl ID - What should I do if the touch interface is not responsive?
templates.content: Ensure you're only touching a single area of the interface at a time. If contact is made with more than one area at the same time, the tool may not respond. Also, ensure the screen is unlocked. To unlock the screen, quickly double-tap the power button. If the tool is still unresponsive, unplug, wait 15 seconds, and plug in again.

templates.name: Do I need a box spring with a platform bed?
templates.content:
Because foundations and box springs are no longer necessary, platform beds are a cost-efficient alternative and require fewer accessories to make an attractive, comfortable sleep setup.

If you struggle with restless nights or squeaky springs, switching to the flatter profile of a platform bed may offer relaxing firmness. Slatted styles ventilate your mattress, reducing the buildup of allergens and mildew. Many platform bed frames also sit low to the ground, making a bed-skirt unnecessary and allowing children to climb up with ease.

templates.name: How will the Bouq arrive?
templates.content:
Your Bouq is either cut fresh from our sustainable farms or delivered on demand by one of our artisan florists. Our farm Bouqs will arrive in branded boxes, designed to keep the flowers safe during their journey. Included in the box are flower care instructions, a gift card, a vase if ordered, and of course your flowers. Depending on the size of the arrangement, flowers will arrive in 1 (original), 2 (deluxe), or 3 (grand) bunches inside the box. Simply trim and arrange the flowers with fresh water, then watch them blossom!

They're cut at the farms in bud-form and packaged without water tubes to prevent early blooming. This way, you or your recipient will have them for their entire vase life.

templates.name: What is the difference between Pod, Pod Pro and Pod Pro Max?
templates.content: The Pod is a three-layer premium foam mattress, 11 inches deep for the ideal support in all the right places. While the Pod Pro is a five-layer premium foam mattress, 12 inches deep for the ideal support in all the right places. The Pod Pro retains vital features of the original and award-winning Pod, combining new hardware and software improvements to enhance the quality of sleep through smarter temperature based on weather and bedroom data, and even more health tracking capabilities. The difference between Pod Pro and the Pod Pro Max is that the Pod Pro Max's top mattress layer is composed of silver, graphite, and copper to offer an additional level of heat dissipation.

templates.name: Is it a concern if my watch glass steams up?
templates.content:
Luminox watches are produced in a clean room with a controlled relative humidity of 45% to prevent fogging. Under certain circumstances, however, water may condense inside the watch due to the natural humidity. This can happen if the watch is exposed to extreme heat or cold within a short period of time, for example if the watch is first illuminated by the sun and then worn while swimming or under a cold shower. 

Unless the condensation is caused by a weak point due to shock or damage to the watch, it will disappear once the climate has normalized. If the watch glass is still fogged up after two to three minutes at normal temperature, you should send the watch to an authorized service center to repair any jarring or damage to the seals, which could affect the water resistance.

templates.name: Are you an eco-friendly and sustainable company?
templates.content:
The impact we have on our environment, and the planet is incredibly important to us. Everything not used in the manufacturing of our mattress toppers is recycled or repurposed into other products. The Sleepyhead mattress topper is CertiPUR-USÂ® Certified, which means that our foams meet rigorous standards for minimizing off-gassing. Our mattress toppers are made without harmful chemicals such as formaldehyde, ozone depleters, heavy metals and flame retardants. 

Each mattress meets the standard of fewer than 0.5 parts per million VOC (volatile organic compounds). Premium quality textiles and higher density foams mean that Sleepyhead stays in your bedrooms and out of landfills.

templates.name: Why should I care about digestive plaque?

Dr. Ghannoum realized that to support overall digestive health and total gut balance, you must be able to break down digestive plaque, allowing good bacteria and fungi to help reach bad bacteria and fungi hiding within the plaque.

templates.name: Can the Coravin Sparklingâ¢ Wine Preservation System be used with still wines?
templates.content: No. This is an important safety note. The Coravin Sparkling System is designed for use with sparkling wines only. Do not use the Sparkling System on still wines. Still wines have a different bottle design and composition than the bottles used for sparkling wines. Using the Coravin Sparkling System on still wine bottles may cause the still wine bottle to break and could cause serious injury.

- Let us know who your doctor is and we'll act on your behalf to verify

Also, you are more than welcome to take an online vision test here: https://www.lensdirect.com/vision-test It will take about 10 minutes and you can do it from home.

templates.name: Why are some Art Prints more expensive than others?
templates.content:
Most of the more expensive Art Prints, if they are not oversized, maybe one or a combination of the following:

- Signed by the artist: The artist's signature appears on the print.
- Limited edition: The publisher or artist has released a limited amount of each print.
- Serigraph: An Art Print that is printed through a silkscreen stencil. Each color requires a separate stencil and is printed with higher-quality ink.
-  Lithograph: An Art Print that has been produced by the process of putting designs or writing with a greasy material on stone, from which printed impressions are produced.

templates.name: What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it?
templates.content:
If the tracking information indicates that your items have been delivered to the address provided on the purchase but you have not received it, please check surrounding houses, doorsteps, etc. in case another home received it by mistake. 

Speak with any other tenants such as family, roommates or landlords etc. in the event they received it on your behalf. The package may also have been left with property managers, an apartment office or your local postal provider.

I would also suggest allowing another 2 business days as there are times when the package is marked Delivered but delivered shortly thereafter. If there's still no package, please let me know so I can review it with my team!

templates.name: Body Shield Classic SPF 50: Color transfers to clothes
templates.content: We are sorry to hear you are experiencing this issue. The neutral tint in Body Shield Classic is achieved using iron oxides, which are mineral pigments. These mineral pigments sit on top of the skin rather than absorbing into the skin. Although the current formulation of Body Shield Classic offers improved transfer resistance from our original formula, it's not transfer-proof. To minimize color transfer, apply in thin layers, waiting 1-2 minutes to dry between layers. Take care when in contact with delicate or light-colored fabrics. Wash immediately with warm water and gentle detergent if color has transferred.

templates.name: For customers with product ideas / suggestions / proposals
templates.content: We're not able to accept or review any unsolicited ideas, proposals or suggestions. Our team works with their knowledge, expertise, and creativity to generate ideas, and while we love hearing from you, the purpose of this is to avoid potential misunderstandings when our ideas might seem similar, or even identical. If you submit ideas to us despite our request to the contrary, the following terms will apply to your submission - we may, or may not review your submission, all ideas contained in your submission will automatically become our property. You won't be entitled to compensation in any form from us, we may use the ideas of your submission for any purpose, in our sole discretion, including, without limitation, for commercial purposes or for no purpose at all, and we will be under no obligation to keep your submission confidential. We, however, welcome feedback on your experience with our products. If you choose to do that, please provide only feedback specific to your experience with us.

templates.name: Are carbon offsets the best way to slow climate change?
templates.content: The best way to slow climate change is to not release carbon emissions in the first place. There are many ways to reduce your carbon footprint, but it's impossible to eliminate it completely. For reducing climate impact that can't be eliminated, high-quality carbon offsets are the most credible and impactful tool.

templates.name: How do I use GDY Rinse Color Kind Conditioner?
templates.content: Begin with clean, wet hair. Let it sit for 1-2 minutes and rinse. Rinsing out GDY Color Kind Conditioner with cool or cold water helps your hair hold more shine! And, if you're a semi-perm user, washing, and rinsing in cool or cold water helps to retain your color for longer.

templates.name: Edge - How do I use it?
templates.content: Brush the section from root to tip, gliding slowly in the direction of hair growth. Continue working with 2" sections until hair is fully styled. Turn the smoothing hair brush slightly to use the heated edge for smoothing and adding volume at the roots. When nearing the ends, turn the brush slightly, as the heated edge will help create shape and bend at the ends. For more styling versatility, twist the brush while combing through hair to add a gentle wave to your strands.

templates.name: Which chiller is the best one for me?
templates.content: The 3000 series is great for light-duty use in temperature-controlled environments. The 5200 series is recommended for applications that aren't in temperature-controlled environments for sustained usage or medium or high power usage. Finally, the 5202 is internally the same as the 5200 but with double the inputs and outputs. This is ideal for people running multiple lasers or 2-tube lasers.

templates.name: Is there anything I shouldnât use on my mat?
templates.content: Avoid acrylic or oil paints. Take care that you do not use markers or ball point pens directly on the mat. And be mindful with scissors and other sharp object as they may cut the mat. Avoid using watercolors on printed mats as they are more sensitive to them. Some sunscreens can also stain the mat, particularly mineral sunscreen. Be sure to take caution when using highly pigmented items on your mat including food and beverages as we cannot be held responsible for damage done after the mat has been used.

templates.name: How do I get the size label off of my tee without ruining the screen or transfer?
templates.content: Size labels should never be so sticky that they damage a screen or transfer image, but pulling them off slowly and carefully can avoid the remote possibility of damage.

templates.name: How do I add rewards to my subscription?
templates.content:
To add a reward discount, log into your account and click on your rewards points at the top corner of the page. This will navigate you to the Rewards landing page, where you can "Redeem Points for Discounts" and choose to redeem a discount of $5, $10, $15 or $20. Click to redeem your coupon and make sure you copy the discount code it brings up. Please note you may only use one discount code per order.

Then, go back into your account by clicking your name and navigating to the Subscriptions tab. You will see "Have a promo code?" and click on it. That will pull up a box where you can paste your discount code into and click the arrow to confirm. Your discount is now attached to the next subscription. You can do this any time in the month before your order processes.

templates.name: What's the best way to decide between the 26 and 29" roller?
templates.content: When choosing between a 26" and 29" case, consider what you plan to pack and how long your trip will be. If you're taking a shorter trip or are a light packer, a 26" case may be sufficient. However, if you plan to pack more or are going on a longer trip, a 29" case may be better suited for your needs. It's also important to consider your mode of transportation and any weight restrictions that may apply. Additionally, some people may find a larger case more cumbersome to handle, so that's something to consider as well. Ultimately, it comes down to personal preference and what you feel will work best for your specific travel needs.

templates.name: What is Intermittent Fasting?
templates.content: Intermittent fasting (IF) can be defined as fasting for less than 2 days. Time-restricted eating (e.g.: overnight fasting for 12-16 hours), the 5:2 diet, and alternate day fasting are all included under the umbrella term of IF. While there are a variety of fasting methods within the category of IF, they are all based on eating patterns that alternate between intervals of eating and fasting.

templates.name: Is Nutrafol FDA Approved?
templates.content: The FDA has regulatory oversight for dietary supplements, including responsibility for dietary supplement claims, labeling, and manufacturing. However, unlike drugs, there is no formal FDA prior review and approval process before supplements are sold. Nutrafol supplements are manufactured in the U.S. using domestic and imported ingredients in a Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) certified facility compliant with 21CFR111 for Dietary Supplements and applicable parts of 21CFR117 for Foods, as required by the FDA. GMPs are a set of FDA requirements that outline manufacturing processes and procedures to ensure the purity, strength, and identification of our Nutraceuticals and give you the assurance that Nutrafol products contain exactly what is written on the label.

templates.name: Why is my candle releasing soot?
templates.content:
Soot is a natural occurrence for any candle. If your candle is continuously releasing soot, it can be the result of carbon build-up on the wicks, not trimming the wicks of the candle, over-burning the candle, or burning the candle in an area that is receiving a draft from a vent.  

If you are experiencing excess sooting, try trimming your wicks to 1/8'', moving your candle to another location, or extinguishing your candle if it has been burning for more than 3-4 hours.

templates.name: Can I clean the Siena cover?
templates.content:
Important: Please do not attempt to remove the cover to wash it. This will invalidate the warranty. For light spills and stains, you can spot clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent, or hand soap. For bigger or deeper stains, an upholstery cleaner or cleaning device should work well. But in both cases, take care not to let liquid reach the underlying foam layers. If you remove the mattress cover, it's possible to damage the foam layers. And as mentioned, this will invalidate your warranty.

If you're worried about stains, we recommend using a water resistant mattress protector (you can buy these in the accessories section on this site). This protector can then be removed from time to time and laundered.

templates.name: Screen printing logo requirements/ personal artwork
templates.content: Yes, we can do custom-printed designs on garments only. Please note that helmets are not customizable. If you're providing your own artwork, it must be provided in a high-resolution, at least 300 dots per inch at 100% size, "camera-ready" file. If the image is distorted or pixilated, it won't allow for a good quality print. If you're sending it via email, please ensure that it is in a PC compatible format (.tif, .jpg, .eps, .ai, .psd). "Live," layered files (not flattened) are requested for PhotoShop images sent as color separation may be necessary for multiple color printing. Word files can't be used. Images taken from the internet won't provide the resolution necessary to print a quality logo. Editable Line/Vector art is recommended for optimum results. Type (fonts) must be turned into "paths" or "outlines" as your typestyle will be missing when you send your art file unless you properly embed the font or attach the actual font file with it. Font substitution will be necessary if the font isn't included or paths or outlines are created on the text. The print will only look as good as the art provided.

templates.name: How much sun do I need to cook in the Go?

templates.name: How does the meat stay frozen while in transit?
templates.content: We package all our meat with dry ice inside the highest-quality Styrofoam, which acts as an insulator to keep the product at the appropriate temperature. While your meat may not be completely frozen when it arrives, it should still be refrigerator-cold - that is, below 40Â°F as measured by a food thermometer. Refrigerator-cold meat is safe to eat or refreeze for later consumption; when left in the vacuum-sealed packaging, it can stay thawed in the fridge for 3 days prior to cooking or refreezing.

templates.name: Can I use wood pellets in a Solo Stove fire pit?
templates.content:
We don't suggest using wood pellets in a Solo Stove fire pit because they can fall through the bottom grate and get stuck inside. If the wood pellets get wet or come in contact with moisture, they can swell and cause damage to the unit. 

I'd recommend taking a look at our Fire Pit Pellet Adapter which will optimize your fire pit for a pellet-fueled burn and turn it into the ultimate dual-fuel backyard: https://solostove.com/en-us/p/fire-pit-pellet-adapter?option_id=1279&queryID=ca8e62c1fc2a0cbdfbfcb7d783719b88centerpiece.

templates.name: Do I need new tubes?
templates.content: Installing new tubes may improve the performance of your amp, especially if it has been played a lot! Power tubes wear out with use, and they need changed on a regular basis. Preamp tubes can last much longer, and generally do not need to be changed unless you are unsatisfied with the sound of the amplifier. If your amp still sounds good and is as loud as it should be, you likely do not need to replace the tubes yet.

templates.name: How do I scent a specific place I want my dog to pee on?
templates.content: First, wipe up a urine accident with a clean, damp paper towel before cleaning up the mess. Transfer the scent by wiping the now soiled paper towel on the desired item. The last step, take a damp, clean paper towel with you when you take your dog out to potty. You can either slide the paper towel directly underneath your squatting pup to catch the urine, or you can blot the spot where they pee. Again, transfer the scent by wiping the soiled paper towel on the place you want them to potty.

templates.name: What is your Try On Guarantee?
templates.content:

In either case, there will be no return required. If you bought more than one pair of underwear or socks on your first order we recommend wearing and washing just one pair to make sure they are right for you. That way if you don't love that pair, the rest of your order will still be eligible for a standard return or exchange.

The Try On Guarantee only applies to one pair of underwear within 30 days of receipt and it doesn't include long underwear, long johns, or running tights.

templates.name: What is the difference between OLAY facial moisturizers: serums, lotions, creams and Whips?
templates.content:
Good question! With so many options, it can be tough to choose. Here's some information about the key differences.

Serums are concentrated moisturizers that are lighter weight than creams or lotions, and their active ingredients are generally more potent. They target a variety of skin concerns (like hyperpigmentation and dark spots) by delivering a large dose of key ingredients. Some serums can be used alone, but most OLAY serums are designed to be worn under another moisturizer. Find out more about our range of OLAY Serums. 

Lotions have a medium consistency. Many people prefer them for daytime use since they're easily absorbed into the skin. You can use them alone or over a serum. They tend to be good for oily or combination skin. 

Creams, the most common type of moisturizer, are richer and thicker than lotions and serums. They easily penetrate skin to deliver key ingredients that lock in moisture. By binding water to the skin and reducing evaporation, creams actually increase skin's water content. Not all cream moisturizers are the same, so it's important to choose based on your skin type. Check out OLAY Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, Vitamin C Lightweight Moisturizer, and Retinol 24 Night Moisturizer, a few of our most popular creams.

OLAY Whips are one of our more recent breakthroughs in skin care science, delivering powerful results with a light-as-air finish. Whips are uniquely formulated with Active Rush Technologyâ¢ to hold and quickly release 1000x their weight in hydration and active ingredients. Whips transform from cream to liquid on contact, flash absorbing into skin and leaving a smooth, matte finish. They're available with and without SPF in our Regenerist line.

templates.name: Can I store my bullbs?
templates.content: Flower bulbs are most successful when planted during the same season in which they were harvested. It's not recommended to attempt to store bulbs for the following year. If for any reason bulbs are unable to be planted during the same season, they should be chilled (placed in a refrigerator) or planted as soon as possible, depending on the type of bulb and season. For instance, if fall-planted bulbs are discovered after the ground is already frozen, they should be placed in the refrigerator and then planted in the spring. If a spring-planted bulb is left unplanted during the spring season, it should be planted as soon as possible during the summer season. Even if it does not bloom that same year, it may return the following season.

templates.name: How do I adjust a bow tie?
templates.content: On the band of the bow tie, you will see numbers (they correspond with your neck size). Next to each of those numbers are eyelets (horizontal openings) that the metal, T-shaped piece will slide into. It will lock into place once you have done so. This is how you adjust the neck size. For the pre-tied bow tie, you take the strap of the bow tie around your neck, and the metal piece that slides freely on the strap will hook into the hook on the front of the bow tie.

templates.name: Do I need to shake before drinking?
templates.content:
As MÃ kku is lightly filtered, rice sediment settles at the bottom of the drink over time. This rice sediment enhances the texture and flavor of the drink, so it is important to gently shake the can, or pour the entire drink into a cup, to mix the rice sediment back into the body of the drink.

Be careful not to vigorously shake the can, as the drink is carbonated and can overflow upon opening. Alternatively, you can let the drink settle for a minute after you have shaken the can.

templates.name: What is a subscription and how does it work?
templates.content:
Bonafide subscriptions are designed to provide you with the best value, convenience, and support throughout your treatment. Not only is it the best way to save on Bonafide products, but it is also the easiest way to maintain a consistent treatment regimen.

If you'd prefer to start with a one-time purchase, that's totally fine! You can always explore the subscription options later if you feel comfortable.

templates.name: How do I take Performance Revival?
templates.content: Simply mix the complete serving(s) of ARMRA Colostrum Performance Revival in any volume of water, liquid, or food, as long as it isn't hot, as this can degrade the natural, bioactive compounds. Performance Revival is a chocolate flavor and is easily incorporated into cold liquid or mixed into or sprinkled onto any food, like yogurt. Please note, clumping is expected, which is an indication of the product's purity, as we add no agglomerating or chemical agents to increase the product's dissolvability, unlike most other powders on the market.

templates.name: The color of my skin is different from your pictures/website.
templates.content: Unfortunately, color accuracy is more complicated than you might imagine. Unlike any other material, matte-finish laminated vinyl takes the top spot as being the most adaptive when it comes to tones, at least that's been our experience. A single flat hue, FDE for example, can look pink indoors and grey when taken outside. Even photographs can't quite capture the look of the vinyl with absolute accuracy. We actually put together a great article about this which you can check out here: https://www.gunskins.com/blogs/dominant-lack-of-presence/metamerism

templates.name: How long does the pouches last?/Can I still use opened pouches?
templates.content: Gus's pouches will last 30 - 90 days depending on airflow. If you put them in a tight, enclosed area, like an RV or vehicle cab in the fall, they should be good until freeze-up at which point the mice have stopped moving. If you use them in a closet or garage where there is more airflow, they will last about 30 days. Pouches unused, sealed in the silver bag, will last for months and months since the bag is air tight. Hope this helps!

templates.name: How do I change the delivery address for my subscription?
templates.content: Once you log in here: https://flamingoestate.com/account/login, select "subscriptions" at the top of your screen. You can select "Edit" next to the subscription that you'd like to update. There will be a new banner at the top of your screen - select "Shipping." Add your new shipping address in this section. After adding, go back to your subscription and select to edit again. Scroll down, and on the bottom left you will see a box labeled "Shipping & Billing." When you click on this box, all of your addresses will appear on the right hand of your screen and you'll be able to select which one you want your box to go to moving forward. Just make sure that the correct delivery address is selected by Wednesday at 9pm, as our system bills on the Thursday before your planned delivery.

templates.name: My Beard Serum has gotten thick and wonât pump out anymore, what do I do?

Since we focus on using natural and naturally-derived ingredients that are healthy and non-toxic, we don't include unhealthy fillers in our products which could help alleviate this issue. To solve this problem, simply place the bottle in hot water for 30 seconds and the product should be much easier to dispense.

templates.name: Proper Hydration: How can I tell if Iâm dehydrated?

You can learn more about dehydration and the side effects at the following link: https://liquid-iv.com/blogs/news/8-ways-to-tell-you-re-dehydrated

templates.name: Care instructions / washing
templates.content: Our bags aren't machine washable as these washing appliances may twist and pull our gear in ways that permanently damage the bag. The official material cleaning instructions for ballistic nylon and tarp are to first treat them with a dry solvent, followed by a spray cleaner or detergent and water. Avoid chlorine or bleach based cleansers. We recommend cleaning and drying the metal parts after you clean the rest of the bag to prevent rust. Less officially, it never hurts to burn some sage to promote bag healing. Following that, we recommend using simple green (or other mild solvent) on the affected areas, then give the bag a warm and soapy bath in dawn or a similar dish-washing liquid. A nylon brush or cloth will help scrub and lift any stains. Once you're done, pull the liner inside out until dry.

templates.name: Does Revaree Plus contain almond oil/nuts?
templates.content: Revaree Plus contains refined sweet almond oil. While topical sweet almond oil is not considered a notable allergen by the FDA, out of an abundance of caution, we advise avoiding Revaree Plus if you have a known sensitivity or allergy to almonds. In such cases, we recommend trying Revaree instead, our original vaginal dryness solution that contains hyaluronic acid but no sweet almond oil.

templates.name: Does the bike have a lock?
templates.content:
The bike doesn't have a lock feature in order to start using it, but the battery has one - this is so that if the bike got stolen, the theft will not be able to charge the bike without the key used to unlock it - rendering the bike useless. 
 
While Rhinos come with a key lock on the battery, we recommend investing in a quality lock to protect your bike when you're not riding it. Our go-to models are the Kryptonite "New York Legend" and "Evolution". While we don't sell these locks, they're easy to find online and in a number of sports or specialist bike shops. 
 
For more information on how to protect your bike from loss or theft, you may view this article: https://zugo.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360046847252-Protecting-your-Rhino-against-loss-or-theft

templates.name: Care instructions
templates.content: Our roses require minimal care to last up to 3 years, just make sure they are kept in a cool and dry place, away from excess heat so they can thrive! The ideal temperature is 60-75F degrees and the ideal humidity is 50-70% (under 50% use a humidifier to avoid them from drying). Keep in mind the petals are very delicate so avoid touching them and use soft/sensitive duster for cleaning. The roses shouldn't be watered or removed from the box, however long stem roses should be taken out of the shipping box and placed in a vase where we suggest you keep them for the entire lifetime.

templates.name: Why donât you use preservatives in your products ?
templates.content: In order to create a "clean" skincare line free of harmful chemicals we use Tocepherol in our products. Tocepherol is commonly known as Vitamin E. It's an antioxidant with properties that help protect the skin from environmental factors while nourishing dehydrated skin. Tocepherol also conveniently acts as a natural preservative alleviating the need for potentially dangerous chemicals in our formulations. We strongly suggest always using clean, dry hands when applying any of our balms to eliminate potential bacteria growth within the tins.

templates.name: Why did you stop making this shoe?
templates.content:
To be honest, John is an artist. New ideas and inspirations occur continuously and need to be explored in the mind of an artist. It's not exciting to do the same thing over and over, and it's exciting to design new and never before seen shoes and boots. Of course, some styles have become so ingrained into Fluevogian culture it's hard to imagine Fluevogs without Angels or.... Some old styles get reinvented, and remade, but only John decides that.

If there is style that you are desperate to have on your feet, check out the Flueseum, search it out, and "like" it. If enough Fluevogers "like" a style, who knows? John may be inspired to bring it back.

templates.name: Why do some fragrances not have a good scent throw in soy?
templates.content: Soy wax is much denser than paraffin wax and sometimes has a harder time releasing the fragrance. This is one of the reasons fragrance testing is very important as some will perform better in soy than others. Even when using different blends of soy, you may get varying results.

templates.name: Where do I keep the DoggieLawn?
templates.content: DoggieLawns are best kept in a spot that is well lit and has good air circulation! However, it ultimately can be kept anywhere as it's made to be disposed of after a certain period of time and not last indefinitely. The root bedding is what absorbs urine, but is hydrophobic, which means it allows water to evaporate quickly. Putting the DoggieLawn in an area with good air circulation is not mandatory, but will help extend the life of the lawn.

templates.name: How to eat and pair caviar
templates.content:
You should start with small portions of caviar, no more than two small spoonfuls (less than 2 oz). It should be served chilled and we recommend a traditional mother of pearl serving spoon. Allow yourself to savor the caviar without chewing to extract the luxurious buttery flavor from the pearls.

Caviar is a delicious addition to many meals and recipes. The most common accouterments include creme fresh, lemon wedges, hard-boiled eggs, or minced onions. It is popularly served with champagne, and if you select champagne, we recommend a "brut" or "extra brut".

templates.name: Why does your testing show the presence of gluten?
templates.content: The gluten test is only able to test the presence of gluten to a certain level. This test detects gluten when it is more than 0.0005% of the sample. Since there is gluten found, the result is that there is less than 0.15mg per 30 grams. In other words, no gluten was detected, but the test is unable to say that there is 0% gluten, instead it can say there is less than 0.0005% gluten. The FDA standard for gluten-free is less than 20ppm, and our test shows there is less than 5ppm.

templates.name: Can I use the Vegamour hair serums if I'm pregnant or breastfeeding?
templates.content:
We get this question a lot. Only your obstetrician can tell you what's safe for you, but, we can tell you that the reason that most serums aren't safe for pregnant women is because they contain hormones. And the more common hair serums contain minoxidil, which is a drug. Vegamour hair serums do not contain synthetic hormones, nor do they contain drugs including minoxidil.

They're always vegan and natural. But just to be sure, we'd recommend that you take a list of the ingredients (found on any product page) to your doctor.

templates.name: How long will frozen products last in my freezer?
templates.content:
Generally, the USDA states freezing keeps food safe almost indefinitely, with quality being affect by the freezer conditions and length of time being frozen. A key component to maintaining quality is ensuring the wrapping/packaging of the product is not permeable to air (i.e vacuum sealed). 

For optimum taste and tenderness, the USDA recommends storing all frozen foods at 0Â° F (or lower) to retain vitamin content, color, flavor and texture. If you do not vacuum seal all your frozen food and/or given your home freezer may not be that cold, we recommend you use frozen products within 4 weeks of receipt.

templates.name: Are the results still accurate even if I tested 6 weeks into the preganancy?
templates.content: We're constantly working on improving the sensitivity and accuracy of our test. We recently completed a 4-month long clinical trial with a new improved test process. In this study, 113 women provided DNA samples at 6 weeks and 8 weeks into pregnancy. We also surveyed the women after their anatomy ultrasounds. All fetal sex predictions at all timepoints matched, which means our SneakPeek test can be taken at 6 weeks into pregnancy as measured by either LMP or estimated due date with confidence. The SneakPeek test is the same whether your blood sample is taken through SneakPeek Clinical or collected using Lancet or Snap. All methods are fine for use at 6 weeks, with 99.9% accuracy!

templates.name: Does Cacao Bliss have caffeine?

templates.name: Height/weight limit for Travel Crib
templates.content:
The Newton Travel Crib & Play Yard is designed to grow with your child from infancy through toddler years. As with any children's product, your little one's milestones will be the best indicator to determine when it is time to transition out of the product.

The Travel Crib & Play Yard Bassinet Insert is designed for newborns and infants up to about five months or roughly 15 pounds. Once your little one begins to push up on hands and knees, or can roll over, it is time to transition from the Bassinet insert to the main Travel Crib. The Travel Crib & Play Yard is designed to be used from infancy through the toddler years. Once your toddler is able to use the side rails to pull themselves up off the floor in an attempt to climb out, the Play Yard should no longer be used.

templates.name: What do grams/weight mean?
templates.content: The most common measurements of the thickness of hair extensions are grams and it usually comes in packages of 120g, 160g, 180g, and 220g. templates.name: Can I use hair color if I have a sunburned scalp?
templates.content: It will generally take upwards of 3 - 5 days for your scalp to heal after a sunburn. Be sure the inflammation and redness have dissipated before applying any hair color. The overall pH of the formula can irritate your scalp and make the experience unpleasant. As a rule, if your scalp feels uncomfortable, do not color your hair. Wait until your scalp returns to normal.

templates.name: Where is my donation going?
templates.content: Every product has a specific donation attached to the sale of the item. Rather than donating a "percentage of profits or proceeds" like other organizations, we donate an exact amount of money from each product sold, which is built into the cost of the product and communicate it transparently and simply in terms of the end use for the funds, which is school meals. For example, your purchase of the FEED 10 Bag (stamped with a 10), helps provide 10 school meals for children in need. To actually donate and distribute the meals, we work with two incredible giving partners who are on-the-ground - the UN World Food Programme for global giving and No Kid Hungry for domestic giving. The dollar amount is donated by us to one or both of our giving partners, who then allocates and distributes meals through their network of governments, schools, and relief workers around the globe.

templates.name: Do your products contain silicones?
templates.content: Silicones reduce the greasy, sticky, and heavy feeling that most people associate with sunscreens. templates.name: Is it ok for my dog to swallow the small ends of a bully stick?
templates.content:
In short, yes, it is safe. Our bully sticks are single-ingredient protein items, so they are highly digestible and can be consumed in larger pieces. 

Even though bully sticks can be digested, it is important for owners to supervise their pets and treat each pet differently. Some dogs, especially those who were abused or are guarded eaters, will tend to swallow their food and treats without proper chewing. This can present a choking hazard if too large of a bully stick is swallowed. Remember to use caution with any new dog chew and spend time understanding your dog's behavior and reaction to them.

templates.name: Brush-On Shield SPF 50 Glow: Face Shield Glow is better

templates.name: What if I eat a meal inside the next day box in the middle of the night during the program?
templates.content: Technically, since you ate it on the respective day for that item, it's within the study's limitations as we did define the timing of the meals as a factor to realize program benefits. Although we don't have any studies to show that eating a meal item in the middle of the night decreases the effectiveness of the program, it could mean you are hungrier during the day when you don't have anything left to eat in that day's box. Thus, it's best to try to stick to eating only during the normal schedule shown on the meal card whenever possible.

templates.name: Why are there so many different waxes?
templates.content: There are different waxes formulated for different types of candles - you can choose from container, pillar, or votive, or even tart wax. Within each candle type, you may have a few waxes from which to choose. Each wax will have its benefits and maybe drawbacks depending on your preference. For example, within the container waxes we have, some are extremely soft and require only one pour, but there are some that are harder and require a second pour. Within the pillar waxes, you can choose a wax with a more consistent color throughout or one that has a mottled effect. For more information on the different waxes we offer, please see the Intro to Candle Waxes section of our Candle Making University here: https://www.lonestarcandlesupply.com/candle-making/candle-wax

templates.name: What is nuruk?
templates.content: A traditional Korean fermentation starter, nuruk is a spontaneously fermented grain (ie. wheat, rice) cake that consists of various microorganisms and yeasts. Nuruk's microorganisms provide enzymes that break down the rice's starches into sugar, and yeasts to convert the sugar into alcohol.

templates.name: What is the Leaping Bunny standard?
templates.content: The Standard is short for the Corporate Standard of Compassion for Animals, a voluntary pledge that cosmetic, personal care, and/or household product companies based in the US or Canada make to clear animal testing from all stages of product development. A company's ingredient suppliers and/or manufacturers must make the same pledge. The result is a product guaranteed to be 100 percent free of new animal testing. All Leaping Bunny companies must be open to independent audits, and commitments are renewed on an annual basis. You can learn more on our Leaping Bunny FAQ page here: https://ourkindra.com/pages/leaping-bunny

templates.name: How firm/soft is Cocobrush?
templates.content:
It's super-duper soft! The Cocobrush's ultra-soft bristles are ~40% finer than traditional bristles, so they're gentler and more effective at sweeping between your teeth and under your gums, where bacterial plaque wreaks the most havoc. 

Many brushes - even "soft" ones - can be too hard and rough on your teeth. They may even contribute to permanent loss of tooth structure, heightened sensitivity, and gum recession. Designed with the long-term health of your mouth in mind, the Cocobrush is so extraordinarily soft, it's fluffy.

templates.name: How is Le Prunier environmentally-sound, clean beauty?
templates.content: Le Prunier is 100% sustainable. Our Plum Beauty Oil is created by cold-pressing upcycled plum kernels, which were previously a waste product on the farm. The remaining flesh of the fruit is then used to create juice, dried fruit, baby food, etc., so nothing goes to waste. Our farm has been 100% powered by solar for the last ten years and we've been committed to organic farming for over 30 years. From start to finish, Le Prunier products remain all natural, ethical, and eco-friendly.

templates.name: General: Why is Liquid I.V. testing positive for gluten when I test it using my at-home testing kit?
templates.content: Based on findings from an ISO globally-accredited laboratory, at-home testing kits could be providing a false positive result for Liquid I.V. This is because the buffers in the Extraction Solution used in at-home testing kits are formulated to work with a pea-sized amount, or a scoop of product (0.5g or less). These measurements are not an issue for conventional food, but for Liquid I.V. one of these suggested measurements equals 0.81g-1.2g which adds 62%-140% more product weight than what is required for accurate results, altering the pH of the Extraction Solution, resulting in false readings.

templates.name: Retinol/niacinamide & CLEARITY
templates.content:
Yes, CLEARITY can be used in the morning, let it sit on bare skin for at least 15 minutes, then followed by CELLRENEW. You may see better results using the CLEARITY at night also INSTEAD of the retinol, or alternating nights. Niacinamide is fine to keep using in addition to CLEARITY but you wouldn't want to use CLEARITY and the retinol on the same night.

So you can start using CLEARITY in the morning and continue her current night regimen, or use CLEARITY in the morning and evenings so long as she is alternating it with the retinol.

If the retinol product has niacinamide in it, that's ok, you would simply use that mixture one night, then CLEARITY the next. If the niacinamide is a separate item then you can use it every night regardless!

templates.name: What are tubers?
templates.content: Tuber refers to the "storage organ" of a particular plant. This part of the plant grows below the ground and stores all of the food and nutrients the bulb needs to produce growth. These tubers' systems are covered with tough skin and often wiry hairs. Tubers grow horizontally to the ground as part of the root system of the plant.

templates.name: What is the difference between precision and custom fit seat covers?
templates.content:
We offer various types of seat covers, most of which are tailored specifically for each vehicle. PrecisionFit seat covers are snug-fitting and foam-backed, except for the Spacer Mesh material. These cannot be machine-washed due to the foam.

Marathon Excel seat covers are also snug fitting, made from our toughest material, Cordura, and are machine washable.

SeatSaver seat covers provide a great fit, but they are designed to be easily installed and removed for convenient machine washing. 

Bucket seat covers are typically a one-piece design with pillows that secure in between the seats for added security. Other designs are two-piece bucket seats, with a separate bottom and top that allow for a snug fit.

Anything labeled as Ready-Fit is a semi-custom design, so the fit may not be as precise as custom covers. These designs accommodate a wider range of patterns.

templates.name: Tips for getting out of the kayak from a dock
templates.content: If you're exiting the Oru Kayak from a dock, paddle up to the dock, until you are directly parallel to it. Place the paddle behind you, perpendicular to the boat, in the same position as when you entered the kayak. Holding the paddle and pressing it down into the kayak, push yourself up and out of the cockpit and sit onto the dock. Pull one leg out of the kayak, then the other.

templates.name: How do I hand wash my knitted clothes?
templates.content:
In lukewarm water, about 20Â°C (70Â°F), add special cashmere/wool shampoo and stir to dissolve evenly. Soak the garment in the wash basin, but don't leave it to soak for long. Squeeze gently until it's clean. To completely remove the shampoo, rinse in clean water thoroughly but carefully. Gently squeeze out the excess water, but don't wring the garment for it will lose its shape. 

To dry, please try to shape the garment to its original form and lay it flat. For quick drying, you may roll the garment with a towel. In doing so, roll slowly to avoid wrinkles. Straighten the garment back to its original shape after unrolling. Lay it flat to dry completely. Never tumble dry or hang dry your cashmere pieces.

templates.name: What is Revaree?
templates.content: Revaree is an easy-to-use vaginal insert that's designed to provide relief without mess or inconvenience. The main ingredient, hyaluronic acid, is produced naturally throughout the body and plays a significant role during cell development and wound healing. In the case of vaginal dryness, it works to attract and retain moisture in the cells of the vaginal lining, which helps to create a healing environment for thinning and damaged skin. The hyaluronic molecules in it can absorb up to 1,000 times their own weight in water, which helps regain vaginal elasticity and softness. Additionally, hyaluronic acid has been rigorously studied in multiple clinical trials and is shown to be safe and free of side effects, with no effect on estrogen levels.

templates.name: Why didn't I get the shoes in box?
templates.content: We believe that packaging is the most wasteful thing in the retail industry. Because we love our environment and believe in doing our part, a large percentage of our packaging is made from cornstarch. Our 100% Cornstarch Polybags are biodegradable and will disintegrate over time. Currently, we are in the process of transitioning into having all our shoes packaged in these Eco-friendly Polybags, which is why some of our shoes do not come in boxes. We truly appreciate your support in our decision to be environmentally friendly.

templates.name: What happens if I develop a hole or damage in the hull of my boat?
templates.content:
While the Oru Kayak hull is extremely durable and unlikely to get a hole, we like to prepare for any situation, and super sharp rocks and boulders can cause damage. If you do develop a hole or some other form of damage to the skin, we have some options! 

The Oru Repair Kit will keep you afloat. It includes high-bond waterproof tape patches, expanding foam sealant that can be injected inside the double-layered skin, and primer sticks to improve glue and tape bonding. And if you are still within the 1-year warranty period, send us a message at service@orukayak.com. We will take care of you!

templates.name: How does the Stojo Bottle work?
templates.content: To expand your Stojo bottle - unscrew the cap, hold by the tabs on either side of the collar, and pull the bottle up. (We don't recommend pulling by the cap, as the band can come off.) To collapse your Stojo bottle - unscrew the cap and collapse the bottle down into itself. (Pro tip: hold the bottle between both hands, and press down on the ridges with your fingers.) Screw the cap back on and stow away, or hook the cap band to your bag. You can also take a look at the video here: https://vimeo.com/378397478

templates.name: Do you install baby car seats?
templates.content:
All Quality Providers are required to provide customers with a car seat manual, or a link to a video that includes installation instructions, but aren't allowed to install a safety seat for a customer due to insurance and liability reasons.

Basic instructions are also typically printed on the car seat itself as a reminder/guide. Please always refer to the user manual to make sure the car seat you're renting is properly secured and appropriately installed. You can find a certified technician at NHTSA should you choose to have someone double check your installation.

templates.name: What is the difference between Nira Pro and Nira Precision Laser?
templates.content:
Both lasers are FDA-cleared and use the same patented, non-fractional, non-ablative laser technology to stimulate natural collagen production without pain, redness, or downtime. Both laser treatments are simple, fast, and effective for clinical-grade wrinkle reduction in as little as 90 days. They also feature 5 power levels (or comfort levels) that enable you to adjust each laser to compliment your skin sensitivity.

With a 10x larger treatment tip than NIRA Precision, the NIRA Pro Laser is able to treat the full face, neck, chest, and back of hands in just minutes a day. In addition, our in-house laser experts designed NIRA Pro without a treatment button - enabling treatment to automatically begin once the device tip is in full contact with the skin. You can also visit our blog to learn more about the differences between NIRA Precision and NIRA Pro: https://www.niraskin.com/blogs/blog/nira-precision-vs-nira-pro

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride in (Sinch)?
templates.content:
While Sinch is an all-terrain fat tire ebike, that doesn't mean that it's all weather permitting. After all, it is an electric bike, with electrical components needing some added caution. Sinch is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is a standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it is okay to ride or park your Sinch in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be wary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Additionally, although Sinch can ride remarkably in snow, that isn't to say it is as safe to ride during active and heavy snowfall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

templates.name: Can kittens use Litter-Robot?
templates.content: Kittens that weigh 3 pounds or more can safely use Litter-Robot 4 in automatic mode, while kittens that weigh 5 pounds or more can use Litter-Robot 3 (with or without Connect) in automatic mode. If your kitten does not meet this minimum weight, leave Litter-Robot off to operate in "semi-automatic" mode. When you see your kitten has used Litter-Robot, turn it on, and Litter-Robot will automatically perform a clean cycle. Once it finishes, turn the power off. This way, your kitten is safe while they get accustomed to Litter-Robot at a young age, and you don't have to scoop the litter box!

templates.name: Which protein should I use for muscle gain?
templates.content:
The best protein powder for muscle gain needs to be a complete, high-quality protein that contains high concentrations of that valuable protein. There should be few additives if any, and you should know their purpose.

Naked Whey can be a great choice for adding protein to your diet. Naked Casein is also great before bed to ensure your body has protein while you sleep. For vegans, Naked Pea is a great option.

templates.name: Is the Kids Natural Mattress Safe?
templates.content: Safety is our absolute priority with the Kids Natural Mattress. This mattress relies on organic wool as a natural fire retardant and is free from any dangerous chemicals, harmful gasses, formaldehyde, fiberglass, and polyurethane foams. Like all Birch Natural Mattresses, it is made in the USA and has been certified safe, organic, and low emission by the strictest global standards.

templates.name: What meat is recommended for making jerky and sausage?
templates.content: Any type of lean meat will work, beef, venison, turkey, etc. For jerky and snack sticks the leaner the meat the better. When making sausage we suggest an 80:20 blend. 80% meat and 20% pork or pork fat. We do not recommend using suet in your sausage mix.

templates.name: Does the Kids Mattress need a foundation?
templates.content:
Unlike a traditional innerspring mattress, the Kids Mattress is a hybrid mattress designed primarily with foam layers. It will require a solid support system to prevent any dipping or sagging in the surface of the mattress.

In order to comply with the terms of our warranty, you will need either a solid platform bed or a slatted foundation with no more than 5 inches between each slat. We do not recommend using a traditional box spring with your Kids Mattress.

templates.name: I'm getting the message "Register Network Failed"
templates.content: The most common reason for getting the message "Register Network Failed" is that your new camera does not have a data plan. Each camera must have its own data plan and it must have that data plan before it can be registered. If you purchased a data plan from Spartan Camera, you should get both a receipt for the data plan and a second email notifying you that your data plan is active. If you've added the camera to your cell phone plan, please check your account to be sure the that camera is active. If you have an active data plan for the camera, then check to be sure that the SIM contacts are clean and that the SIM is seated properly in the slot.

templates.name: I have food sensitivities and a medical issue, can I use Prolon?
templates.content: Regarding any specific medical questions, we recommend consulting with your primary care physician to ensure that our products are safe and right for you. You shouldn't use it if you're allergic to nuts, oats, sesame, celery/celeriac, or other ingredients. It's a very low calorie diet designed to support fasting. Not everyone should fast. Don't use it if you have any pre-existing conditions or are taking any prescription medications, consult your healthcare provider before starting. Don't do it if you have an infection or may be at risk for a repetitive infection, if you're underweight, pregnant, breastfeeding, have a known, diagnosed or suspected eating disorder, or have dietary restrictions, as well as if you're under 18 or over 70.

templates.name: What is the difference between lab grown diamonds and lab created diamonds?

Because both names are used by consumers when shopping, you'll generally see both used by retailers.

templates.name: Why should the Universal Adapter NOT be attached directly to the back of the phone?

templates.name: What are the differences between the Blending Shears?
templates.content:
The Essential Series Reversible Blender is a much more forgiving shear having only 30 teeth. It's an excellent entry level blender but is also perfect when you simply do not want to get too aggressive with weight extraction. The Signature Series Reversible Blending Shear has 42 radial (curved) teeth for removing bulk from a wider section of hair without leaving hard lines. This shear is a favorite for working with men's haircuts, especially scissor over comb work.

The InvisiBlend is anything other than a traditional blender. Its over-polished blunt blade forces the hair over the 23 sharp convex teeth in such a way that no two hairs are cut the same length. This makes for an extremely light removal of weight with no visible lines.

templates.name: Are Bouqs safe to have around pets?
templates.content:
We highly recommend keeping all flowers and plants away from pets, as some may be poisonous. Please consult your veterinarian for questions about what is safe for your pet. We're not the expert in pet safety and we strongly recommend looking into the safety precautions for your specific pet and breed. As a general rule of thumb, Gerbera daisies and roses are typically non-toxic for cats and dogs and would make wonderful gifts for your recipients with those pets.

Lilies, daffodils, tulips, peonies, and Sansieverias (Snake Plants) on the other hand, are among the plants known to cause mild to severe reactions in pets if ingested. We strongly advise against sending these flowers to places where animals may come in contact with them. Again, please consult a veterinarian or other expert if you have any doubt or questions.

templates.name: Difference between the foundation and the frame?
templates.content: Our frames are made of hardened steel, are injection-molded, and have fiberglass-infused resins, while the foundations are made of Birch wood slats with woven exterior upholstery. The foundations are built to be breathable, very sturdy and are needed to support the mattresses. A metal bed frame cannot be placed directly under your mattress. The Foundation is designed to take the place of a box spring and provide support for the mattress so it can be used directly on the ground or on top of the bed frame. The bed frame can be added with the foundation but the bed frame cannot be used on its own with the mattress as it won't provide enough support.

templates.name: What are nootropics and what kind of nootropics do you use?
templates.content: Nootropics are supplements that boost your brain's function by targeting specific neurotransmitters such as serotonin and dopamine. This exotic term derives from the Greek word "noos" (mind) and "tropein," which means "towards." We use a 50mg dose of mood-boosting L-Theanine that is shown to improve memory, decision-making, creativity and overall cognitive performance.

templates.name: What does the single letter at the bottom of the photo indicate?
templates.content:
The letter on the info strip at the bottom of the photo indicates what type of event caused the photo to be taken.

M = Motion-triggered
E = Event (a photo taken at a scheduled time or a manual photo)
T = Time-lapse
F = Photo taken after format SD card request has completed
S = Requested photo (only available on GoLive and some older 3G models)

templates.name: How do I unlock my Rhino to a Class 3?
templates.content:
Just hold down the M key on the keypad for a few seconds then use the plus and minus keys to enter your 4-digit code (included in delivery) on the display. After you've entered the 4-digit code, press the plus button until the screen indicator shows a 7, then wait for the screen to go back to the home mode. You can now access PAS 6 and PAS 7 by using the plus and minus buttons. PAS 7 will get you to a speedy 28 mph with pedal assist.

Remember to check your State and local laws regarding the use of a Class 3 e-bike before unlocking your bike.

templates.name: How To Use TrashieCash?
templates.content:
Simply click "Apply TrashieCash" at checkout. If you do not see this button, please click "Check Out As Guest" at the bottom of the page. This will lead you back to the experience where you can apply TrashieCash. 

A pop-up will appear that will show you your TrashieCash balance, and your order total, and allow you to choose - in increments of $5 - how much TrashieCash you would like to use on your order. You can use TrashieCash for up to 50% off your order (maximum of $200 per order).

After clicking Confirm, a special discount code will be applied to your cart. 

Please note that TrashieCash cannot be used on Take Back Bags or gift cards. When you use TrashieCash, the withdrawal is permanent and cannot be refunded. If you confirm your use of TrashieCash but do not check out, you will find your special discount code matching the amount you withdrew in your TrashieCash Account under "Discount Codes". TrashieCash is not stackable and only one transaction is allowed per order. It cannot be used with other discount codes or existing For Days gift cards.

You can also use your TrashieCash on Trashie.io towards rewards for brands like Uber Eats, Sephora and more.

templates.name: Is your cutlery dishwasher safe?
templates.content: Yes, all our cutlery collections are dishwasher safe to a maximum of 130Â°F. Use a non-citrus, non-abrasive detergent and use the air-dry cycle. templates.name: How do I cook with Made In Copper?
templates.content:
Copper is very heat reactive and should be used accordingly. Never heat your copper empty, and always start from the lowest heat setting with your oil or fat already inside. Copper is soft and incredibly heat-conductive, so you should never heat above medium high.

You should never use metal utensils on your copper cookware, please use silicone or wood utensils.

templates.name: When can I expect a refund for my return?
templates.content:
For larger items like mattresses or furniture, we'll process your full refund within a week of your pickup. If you've financed your order, we always recommend that you continue making payments while we process your return. Rest assured, once your pickup has been completed and confirmed, you'll be refunded any payments you've made, and the remaining balance will be canceled.

For smaller items, our facilities typically take 1-2 weeks to process returns. Once your return is accounted for, we'll refund your original form of payment. Please allow 3-10 business days for the refund to settle back on your original form of payment.

templates.name: Can I pause or skip a month during my membership? Will I retain my benefits if I do? Can I skip for more than one month at a time?
templates.content: When you select to skip your membership, all of your benefits are paused for one month, including the 2% monthly bonus awarded on top of your total R+ Credit. All monthly, yearly or additional contributions are 100% converted to R+ Credit and are eligible for the 2% monthly bonus for the 12 months following that contribution as long as you remain active. If you skip for one month, you lose that bonus, and now you will at most be awarded the 2% monthly bonus 11 times. The more months you skip, the fewer times you will be awarded the 2% monthly bonus. If you never skip a month, your total Rebag+ credit will get an aggregated bonus of up to 27% after 12 months.

templates.name: What material is the bracelet made from?
templates.content:
GreenCircle has certified that every 4ocean bracelet is made with over 95% post-consumer recycled content. Each bracelet is hand-assembled on the island of Bali, by skilled local artisans. The beads are recycled in China and made from certified 95% post-consumer recycled glass bottles including less than 5% reclaimed ocean glass.

To this point, we've found that the UV degradation and contamination that ocean plastic experiences from exposure to harsh conditions make it unable to be the only plastic source for our bracelets at this time. At 4ocean, we're working hard every day to increase the amount of reclaimed ocean plastic used in our products and can't wait to continue increasing this amount over time.

templates.name: How do I remove rust from Made Inâs knives?
templates.content:
Made In Knives should always be towel-dried immediately and never left wet or in a sink, as this can cause rust to form along the blade. However, if you see rust begin to develop, this can be easily treated with vinegar:

â¢ Simply fill up a bowl that can hold your rusted knife with white vinegar. Do not use apple cider, balsamic, or white wine vinegar.
â¢ You can submerge the full knife, but if the blade is the only part with surface rust, you can just place the rusty blade in it. Leave for 3-5 minutes.
â¢ You can use a sponge, wire brush, scrubber, steel wool, scrubbing pad, or even a toothbrush to rub the rust off the knife. Be cautious with metal tools that may leave marks on the blade. Finally, wash the knife with soap and water, and then make sure it is thoroughly dried before putting it away.

templates.name: Can I order from NY/ New York, is there an age restriction?
templates.content:
On April 22, 2024, a new law took effect in New York state that restricts the sale of certain types of dietary supplements marketed for muscle building and weight loss. In order to purchase these types of products, customers will need to verify that they are over the age of 18 at the time of purchase and at the time of delivery.

OLLY has three products impacted by this new law: Combat Cravings, Metabolism Gummy Rings, and Post-Game Recovery Gummy Rings. We made our best efforts to continue shipping these products to New York; however, there are no delivery services that can meet the law's requirements. Unfortunately, these products are not available for shipment to New York. You can purchase them locally in New York with proof of age or through Amazon. We apologize for any inconvenience this causes.

templates.name: Which Beam Angle?
templates.content:
LED lamps and integrated LED downlights are available in a selection of beam angles. From narrow beams with 25 degrees to wider beams of 60 degrees and above. Medium beam angles range from 35 to 40 degrees. Choosing the right beam angle can make a noticeable different for your room. In larger rooms such as living rooms its better to go with wider beam angles, this allows you to spread the downlights out further meaning you don't need to install as many. 

A narrow beam is more focused and intense, a good example of using a narrow beam angle would be in higher ceilings, over 2.4 metres or in track lights or spotlights where you're directing the light onto a specific object or area. You can learn more about beam angles here: https://www.downlights.co.uk/faq-which-beam-angle.html

templates.name: How many pouches should my child have daily?
templates.content:
There is no actual limit to how many pouches or how much your little one should eat. In the first few months of starting solid foods, a baby may eat anywhere from a quarter to a half of a Cerebelly pouch per sitting. But their caloric needs ramp up quickly, so it's important to pay attention to their cues, both when they're still hungry and when they're done eating.

In general, our purees aren't meant to be a complete source of all babies' nutritional requirements. But by giving your little one a variety of our purees daily you can be assured that your little one is getting 16 key brain supporting nutrients, plus protein, fat, fiber, and DHA.

templates.name: How to clean a litter box when using Small Pet Select pine pellets
templates.content:
Here's the secret: when the animal pees, you will only see a tiny little circular spot on the surface. Underneath, though, is a little mountain that has been turned to dust. Picture a volcano.

So the best way to clean these pellets is to use a flexible cookie spatula. Gently push the whole pellets to the side to uncover the pee volcano and then lift that wood shaving volcano shape up with your flexible spatula. You'll find you have a nice clean area, with very little fuss.

If your bun likes a softer surface, we have very soft aspen bedding that can be put on as a "top dressing." It makes all this more affordable too. Can't beat that!

templates.name: Do the handles get hot?
templates.content:
Our longer-handled cookware, such as the Sauté Pan, Fry Pan, and Sauce Pan all have a notch a few inches up the handle. This notch designates at what point the handle should stay cool enough to grab with bare hands. Extended use could cause that warmth to increase slightly further up the handle, but for nearly all regular meals and recipes it would not. Red indicates the areas too hot for bare hands, while blue should be safe to grab: https://caraway.attn.tv/sl/hgcTELz5

The smaller handles, like those on the Dutch Oven and our three lids, can get a little too hot to handle, and we would recommend some of our stylish Caraway Pot Holders to complement those pieces and keep your digits safe.

templates.name: Comparison of all shaver series
templates.content: Our Series 3 is the entry-level shaver we have, and it provides a clean and close shave. Series 5 has easy-clean which allows you to rinse the shaver clean without taking it apart and it introduces AutoSense technology, which detects your beard and adapts power necessary to cut beard hairs. Series 6 adds to AutoSense by giving SensoFlex, a 20 degree pivoting head to maintain better contact with skin making it more efficient. Series 7 continues to have AutoSense and builds on that with an even more flexible head called the 360 Flex, which pivots 20 degrees front to back and 10 degrees side to side. Series 8 moves AutoSense forward with increased power for an easier shave. Series 9 is our best shaver with its 4+1 pro head, utilizing AutoSense and providing the fastest and most comfortable shave we have to offer. Hope this helps!

templates.name: How do I remove the black streaks on the blade from the sheath?
templates.content: Soak the blade with a little WD40 or gun oil for a few minutes, then carefully wipe with a rag or nylon brush. That is a common thing with Shivworks' knives. Please see their FAQ regarding the black marks on the blade: https://shivworkspg.com/faq/. It's the soft kydex rubbing on the harder steel surface, and it easily comes off with a little gun oil! Any black marks on the blade are not a sign of damage, but more a reassurance that your blade is firm and secure within the sheath.

templates.name: What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it?
templates.content:
If the tracking information indicates that your items have been delivered to the address provided on the purchase but you have not received it, Here are the steps to take:
- Check with family members, roommates, or neighbors to see if someone collected the package on your behalf.
- Examine your surrounding area, including parcel lockers or any secure area where deliveries are typically kept.
- Wait 24-48 hours, as packages sometimes are marked as delivered before they arrive.
- If the package is still missing, email support@gopurebeauty.com and provide details so we can investigate the status and assist you

templates.name: How are the age ranges for the two sides of the Kids Natural Mattress determined?
templates.content: In developing the Birch Kids Natural Mattress, we followed industry guidance around the support required for young sleepers as they grow. The firmer side of our mattress provides a bit more support for kids who are transitioning from a crib mattress. As kids grow and develop the softer side offers a bit more plush comfort. The age ranges provided for the Kids Natural Mattress are designed as suggestions. We recommend assessing your child's size and sleep habits to determine which side of the mattress they should use.

templates.name: Can I use NIRA if I have dental implants?

templates.name: How do I choose the right level of compression for my shapewear?
templates.content:
Based on the type of appearance you're looking for, you may consider different levels of control for your shapewear needs. The three types of control are:

- Low Compression (Light Control or Smoothing) - Light control, everyday shapewear pieces will smooth trouble spots so you can rock your look comfortably all day long.
- Medium Compression (Flexible Control or Shaping) - Flexible control shapewear is made with supple, stretchy fabrics that comfortably moves with your body while adding subtle contours to your shape. 
- High Compression (Firm Control or Sculpting) - Often used to provide more contouring to your shape. Firm and extra-firm control pieces are perfect for formal, structured clothing like wedding dresses, prom gowns, evening gowns, and cocktail dresses.

Hope this helps and please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.

templates.name: What's the difference between buying limited edition vs. open edition prints?
templates.content:
As the name suggests, only a limited number of prints will be made available for purchase. For example, if the artist is selling a limited run of 25 prints, once those 25 prints have sold, that limited edition will no longer be available to purchase. The exclusive nature of a limited edition print effectively raises its value and, therefore, its price. 

Unlike limited edition prints, open edition prints may be endlessly reproduced. Because there's no limit to the number of prints that can be made, an open edition print is priced lower than a limited edition print.

templates.name: General: I noticed your products are a bit more expensive than others out there, what’s the difference?
templates.content: From a practical point of view, our fabrics are noticeably softer, longer-lasting, and better at regulating temperature than other products. It's a difference you can feel in any side by side comparisons, even when compared to other viscose from bamboo sheets. We invest more in working directly with every single supplier from seed to finished sheet. This means we personally know and regularly communicate with the farmers, the fiber producers, the yarn makers and weavers, treatment facilities, bag makers, label makers...and so on. This access is unprecedented in the bedding industry and it allows us to make unique and better products that will never pill, shred, discolor, or change feel when washed. It's premium-quality luxury bedding, acutely managed from start to finish. In addition, we personally ensure good working conditions and fair labor practices. Our fiber process recycles water and doesn't release waste into the environment. Additionally, we avoid the use of caustic chemicals unlike most brands. The result of all of this work is the softest and highest quality viscose from bamboo fabric, fiber, and silk made today.

templates.name: How many cats can use Litter-Robot?
templates.content: We recommend up to 4 indoor cats per single Litter-Robot; however, we do have customers with more cats using a single unit. As a rule of thumb, one cat using Litter-Robot 3 requires that the drawer be emptied once per week; two cats, twice per week; three cats, every other day, and so on. Litter-Robot 4 features an enlarged waste drawer for even more waste capacity, which means emptying is required less often. Litter-Robot cycles 7 minutes after each use, but if the wait time is interrupted by another cat entering, the timer will reset for another 7 minutes, which could cause waste to be present in the litter for longer than 7 minutes. Too many cats per single Litter-Robot may result in the litter bed not being clean for the next use.

templates.name: Oru Kayaks versus other Hardshell Kayaks
templates.content: Traditional rotomolded hardshell kayaks are heavy and take up space. You can store 8-10 Orus in the space you can store 1 traditional 12 ft kayak. You will still have rigid kayak performance on the water, but more space in your home or garage. Because they are so compact, they pack in the trunk of your car! No need to spend extra money on a roof rack. We've been told this can help you save on gas $$ too! Our kayaks also have 60% less plastic than traditional rotomolded kayaks on average. There's no need to lift it above your head on a roof rack or recruit friends to help you port it to the water. It's lightweight and easy to transport in a pack, you can walk, bike, or bus it to the water.

templates.name: Can I return items from multiple orders in the same package?

Make sure you have the order numbers for all items you want to return handy. Navigate to the returns portal and enter one of the order numbers with your email. On the next screen, click "Check eligibility" at the bottom of the screen and enter an additional order number. templates.name: What size Tablecloth do I need?
templates.content:
The first step to getting the size right is, naturally, measuring your table. Then add whatever drop length you want to the measurements of each side of the table.

The drop on a tablecloth is typically anywhere between 8 inches and 16 inches, with a longer drop normally used for more formal occasions. (Think white linen tablecloths and waiters in tuxedos.) For an everyday kitchen table situation, err on the side of a shorter drop, somewhere around 6-10 inches.

templates.name: Is HexClad cutlery/knifes dishwasher safe?
templates.content:
While HexClad cutlery and culinary tools have a lifetime warranty against manufacturer's defects, we do not recommend ever using your dishwasher to clean your HexClad cutlery. Please note that dishwasher use can cause damages to the wooden handles as well as rust the Damascus steel blades (both conditions would not be covered under warranty). 

We highly recommend hand washing your knife with a gentle dish soap (free of bleach or citrus extracts). Rinse and towel dry immediately and meticulously to remove any lingering moisture from your blade.

templates.name: Tips on getting into the kayak from a beach
templates.content: If you're entering the Oru Kayak from the beach, position the Oru Kayak so that the cockpit is at the water's edge. Hold your paddle behind you with both hands, perpendicular to the boat (the spoon side of the paddle should be face-up). Use 1 hand to do 2 things: hold the paddle at its midpoint behind the cockpit while simultaneously gripping the back edge of the cockpit's combing (outer edge). Tilt the paddle so one blade rests on the beach. Make sure to keep your weight over the paddle (it's ok to sit on the shaft as you enter the cockpit). Place your feet in the boat, then slide your legs in. Use the paddle as a stabilizing brace. Then bring the paddle in front of you and use both hands to push the boat into the water. With 1 hand, place the paddle blade-down into the sand and push. With the other hand, make a fist, push it onto the beach and drive the boat into the water. Use your hips to add extra forward thrust. Once it's clear of the beach, start paddling.

templates.name: When is the best time to take Vitamin E?
templates.content: Vitamin E can be taken at any time of the day, as it won't affect sleep. However, you should always take it with a meal, or at least with something that contains some fat. This is because it is a fat-soluble vitamin, and this will enhance absorption.
