templates.name: How do I use Warmies?
templates.content:
Warmies plushies and wellness products were designed to offer soothing comfort for individuals of all ages, including adults and children. Our products are infused with dried French lavender to promote relaxation, and they feature a warmable, weighted filling to help reduce anxiety during playtime and bedtime.

When you're ready to relax, simply follow the instructions in our care guide to heat your Warmies in the microwave or place them in a grip-seal freezer bag and chill them for up to 3 hours to enjoy a refreshing coolness. You can cuddle up on the couch, take Warmies to bed, or carry them for comfort on the go.

Whether heated or chilled, Warmies can alleviate aches and pains, help you unwind after a long day, and make bedtime more comfortable for the whole family.

templates.name: What should I do with my old mattress?
templates.content:
I'm happy to help you find resources to dispose of your old mattress. Many people move their old mattress to another room, buy a mattress storage bag and keep it for visitors, give it to a friend, donate it, or even sell it. Here is some more helpful info:

Donate it!
There are tons of great places to donate your mattress located throughout California. Try Goodwill, Salvation Army, or another charity of your choice. You might even be eligible to receive a tax-deductible receipt for your donation while helping out a great cause.

Sell it!
Depending on the condition of your mattress, you may be able to get as much as $250 or more. Prices for used mattresses could start as low as $50 and go up depending on the size, quality, and condition of your mattress. There are a number of great places to list your mattress (or other stuff) for free. Check out Craigslist, Facebook Marketplace, LetGo, and OfferUp for quick and easy places to list.

templates.name: Does Plumscreen help with hyperpigmentation?
templates.content:
The Plumscreen is not tinted and contains Le Prunier Plum Beauty Oil which has a natural yellow hue. Please scroll through the product images here: https://leprunier.com/products/plumscreen-spf-31-sunscreen-pa to watch the video which shows the Plumscreen being applied. 

Plumscreen provides SPF 31 protection and helps with hyperpigmentation. In a large consumer study, 100% of participants showed a reduction in dark spots after 6 weeks of using Plumscreen. After just 14 days, 100% of participants showed an improvement in overall appearance, texture and smoothness after using Plumscreen.

templates.name: Is the water on the Pod quiet?
templates.content: The noise level of the Pod is estimated to range from very low white noise to non-existent. templates.name: How do I care for my wig?
templates.content:
When not wearing your wig, you can place it on a mannequin head. Make sure your mannequin head is not stored in direct sunlight. When washing your wig use a sulfate-free shampoo and conditioner. 

When applying heat, please use a heat protectant before styling. We'd recommend using the Milano Gentle Brush from the ends upwards to remove any tangles. To avoid shedding, don't use conditioners and oils directly on the wig cap. Longer styles do need to be brushed at the nape of your wig daily to remove any tangles.

templates.name: What’s veggie-tanned leather?

templates.name: How often should I use the NIRA Pro Laser?
templates.content:
Consistency is key when it comes to stunning results. The NIRA Pro Laser works similarly to exercise and muscle, it takes time for the collagen to rebuild, and the best results are seen with continued routine use.
 
 For best results with the NIRA Pro Laser, treat your skin daily for 90 days or more according to the instructions. For possible enhanced results, you may treat twice a day; in the morning and the evening. We recommend waiting at least 1-minute before retreating to each area. Daily usage is recommended on an ongoing basis to maintain results.

templates.name: Do I need to shave before each treatment?
templates.content: Yes, you should shave the entire treatment area before using your handset. The easier it is for the light from the handset to hit your hair follicle the more effective it will be. The hair follicle does need to be intact for IPL to be effective, which means no waxing, plucking, threading, or epilating before treatment.

templates.name: Why were some of your product refills discontinued?
templates.content: The decision to discontinue the Sunforgettable refills was made primarily with your skin health in mind. Our Quality Control along with R&D teams were finding that the brush tends to become slightly clogged little by little after being used over an extended period of time (even when cleaned regularly). When this happens, you don't get an ample amount of powder dispensing from the brush, causing you to not be fully protected. In regards to the pressed foundation compact refills, the decision to not offer this moving forward was made because looking at the sales volume we found that most customers preferred a new compact each time.

templates.name: Does green juice contain caffeine?
templates.content: Green Juice does contain trace amounts of caffeine. The only source of caffeine comes from matcha and there is 100mg of matcha per serving which is equivalent to roughly 3-4 mg of caffeine.  Just as a comparison, a regular 8 oz cup of coffee contains about 95 mg of caffeine and an average decaf cup of coffee contains about 7 mg of caffeine. Persons who are very sensitive to caffeine don't typically have issues with the Green Juice.

templates.name: What causes urinary incontinence in women?
templates.content: Pregnancy, childbirth, and menopause all place stress on the bladder and abdomen, affecting the urinary tract and causing pelvic floor muscles and bowels to weaken or become damaged. In addition, the female urethra is shorter than the male urethra and has less muscle controlling urine flow.

templates.name: Which nut / pre-slotted Nut do I need for my instrument?
templates.content:
We're not able to cross-reference the exact nut you would need based on the make and model of your guitar as the exact dimensions vary from instrument to instrument. To select the best nut for your guitar, we recommend that you measure your current nut dimensions (or dimensions of the nut slot if the nut is missing) and compare them to the specifications provided for all the nuts we sell on our website. Here are some helpful links to guide you through the process:
 
How to measure your nut to select a replacement: https://www.stewmac.com/video-and-ideas/online-resources/learn-about-building-instruments-and-kits/does-this-bone-nut-fit-my-guitar/

How to fit a pre-slotted nut to your guitar: https://www.stewmac.com/video-and-ideas/online-resources/learn-about-guitar-nut-and-saddle-setup-and-repair/how-to-fit-a-preshaped-nut-on-a-guitar/

templates.name: Gold Vermeil
templates.content:
Plated jewelry is made by first casting the piece in base metal. An electric current is used to negatively charge that base metal, and it's then dipped into positively charged gold. Like a magnet, the two metals are attracted to one another and a layer of gold is formed on top of the piece. 

Vermeil uses the same plating process but only gets to claim the title of "Vermeil" when it meets a certain standard. The standards are: its base metal must be silver, the outer layer of gold must use a 10k gold or higher (we use 14k), and the gold layer is at least 2.5 microns thick.

templates.name: My cap won’t turn on at all. What might be the reason?
templates.content: Some quick troubleshooting tips if your device is not turning on: There is a sensor in the cap that only allows light to be emitted when the cap is on your head. Check the connection between the cap and the battery pack. Check your battery charge level or charge the battery. And if your battery pack is not turning on, review the following. Ensure that you are not holding the "on" button down too long. Just press and hold on the button to turn the cap on. Make sure your battery is charged. You should fully charge the battery overnight before first use.

templates.name: Do I need to Lighten my hair before applying DYEposit?
templates.content: It depends on what you're looking for. For maintaining your vibrant color, there's no need to re-lighten your hair before applying. For a bold new look, you can use it on freshly lightened hair. For the most vibrant and long lasting results, we also suggest trying a semi-permanent dye. Try picking a DYEposit shade that will work with your natural hair color, so if you have light brown hair, try red or chocolate, and if you're a natural redhead, copper or red will look amazing! If you're still unsure, shoot us an email at hey@gooddyeyoung.com.

templates.name: Can I use Revaree when I'm on my period/menopausal stage? (edit temp as needed)
templates.content: Revaree is intended for any woman experiencing vaginal dryness; this includes both those who are still menstruating as well as menopausal women. For best results, we recommend one Revaree suppository be inserted vaginally every 2-3 days for at least a month. Use during menstruation is acceptable, so there's no need to pause treatment during your period; of course, this is an individual preference. We recommend talking to your health care provider as they know your medical history best. For optimal results, Revaree should be allowed time to dissolve prior to tampon insertion.

templates.name: What's the meaning behind the name 'Third Love'?

templates.name: My cashmere is pilling
templates.content:
Don't fret! La Ligne cashmere is soft, and the softer the cashmere, the more likely it is to experience a bit of pilling. If your sweater begins to pill, we recommend a Netflix + De-Pill session, utilizing either a cashmere comb (we love the Laundress Sweater Comb) or fabric shaver (a small, motorized device that 'defuzzes' your sweater.) Some of our team swear by the Conair Fabric Shaver - we think it's even easier than a comb!

Dry cleaning is the best care method to reduce pilling (and you can even ask your dry cleaner to de-pill for you!), but if you choose to hand wash your cashmere, a gentle touch is key so that you minimize abrasion (the root cause of pilling.)

templates.name: I live in an area with hot/cold weather conditions. Will my product denature in transit?

It is very rare for any denaturation to occur whatsoever as a result of standard weather conditions during the shipping of our products. Our products can be refrigerated or frozen as well without concern as long as the materials remain properly sealed. For storage purposes, we recommend storing each of our materials at room temperature in a tightly-sealed environment that is outside of direct sunlight.

templates.name: Are dip powders hygienic/sanitary?
templates.content: Yes, dipping powders are sanitary. They don't provide an environment where bacteria can survive. In order for bacteria to spread, it must be in a moist environment. If there is any moisture on your nail when dipped into the powder, it will attract the powder to it, not the other way around. The powder won't retain moisture in the jar and therefore won't create an unsanitary environment. Dipping system pots are built for continuous safe use.

templates.name: What does 5 ATM mean? 10 ATM?
templates.content: ATM (standard atmosphere) is a unit of atmospheric pressure at sea level. If your watch has a 5 ATM water rating, it can handle submersion up to 50 meters deep and it can withhold your daily hand washes and shallow submersion. If your watch has a 10 ATM water rating it can handle submersion up to 100 meters deep and it can handle anything from rain to swimming and surfing.

templates.name: How do I clean the Cast Iron Cooktop?
templates.content:
Grease and crumbs can be wiped away while the iron is hot, and you can do this safely with rags gripped by cooking tongs. Remove your cast iron from the Hub using heat-resistant gloves and rinse with just hot water. The most stubborn residue can be removed with our Cast Iron Scrubber and hot water. 

Follow all cleansing with thorough drying. Never let the cast iron soak or be submerged in water for any amount of time. Apply a light coat of seasoning oil to clean and dry cast iron before storing. Season your Cast Iron Cooktop well and often to keep it non-stick.

templates.name: Is Black Ginger safe?
templates.content: Black Ginger has been tested for toxicity (LD50) as well as mutagenicity (Ames Test). So if centuries of traditional use weren't enough to suggest Black Ginger's benefits and safety, the above-mentioned study should be.

templates.name: Can I use a pot or container without a drainage hole?
templates.content:
It is possible to grow succulents in pots without drainage holes, but they make watering more difficult. We do not recommend non-draining pots if you're new to succulents. If possible, drill a hole in the bottom of non-draining containers.

Succulents do not tolerate standing water, so if you choose to use a non-draining pot, water 1/3 the volume of the pot. Do not water again until the soil is completely dry. Err on the side of under-watering and keep an eye out for signs of rot. Adding rocks to the bottom of the pot will not increase drainage. In fact, it can create pockets of water and increase the chance or root rot.

templates.name: Are Inkbox tattoos and Freehand Ink safe?
templates.content:
Yes! Our key ingredient is based on a fruit that indigenous tribes in the Amazon have been tattooing their skin with for thousands of years. Our For Now Ink™ formula has been tested for product safety to ensure it meets cosmetic regulatory requirements. Our tattoos are clinically tested.

Inkbox formulations contain ingredients you may not have put on your skin before. While it's rare, there's a small risk of allergic reaction upon application (or of sensitization through repeated use) - similar to any new product you may apply topically. If you're experiencing any form of physical discomfort or irritability, please get in touch with us at hi@getinkbox.com so we can help. If you have sensitive skin or allergies, it's always a good idea to do a small patch test!

templates.name: Is your coffee single origin?
templates.content: Yes, all of our coffee comes from the same farm. Coffee being from a "single origin" means that all of the beans come from one area of one farm. This helps to ensure that every bean that goes into your coffee is of the same high quality as all of the others. This also means that all of the beans are processed in the exact same way and roasted the same way. This keeps the other beans from mixing with others, which can affect the flavor of your coffee and introduce foreign things like mycotoxins that may be present in other coffee beans that could be blended in.

templates.name: What is the difference in range on the S1 versus S2?
templates.content: The S1 provides an estimated 25+ miles of range at 20mph under throttle-only operation and an estimated 35+ miles of range using ECO pedal assist mode. The S2 is powered by a state-of-the-art 960 watt-hour battery, the largest in the segment. This provides an estimated 40+ miles of range at 20mph under throttle only operation and an estimated 75+ miles of range using ECO pedal assist mode. Battery range estimates depend on conditions such as rider weight, speed, temperature, wind, tire pressure, terrain, incline, etc. Mileage may vary.

templates.name: My pomade is too hard to scoop. Is this normal?
templates.content: Since we don't use any synthetics or softeners it can be temperature sensitive, especially in the winter. A simple fix is to pop it in the microwave with the cap off for 20-25 seconds. This will soften and allow the ingredients to thaw and settle back to normal (you may want to stir it in the jar to mix it all up). Ideal storage is between 68° - 78°. If you don't want to do that, you can also use the back of your thumbnail to scoop it and it will flake right up on your nail. If the product is too soft or mushy when you receive it, simply store at room temperature for a day or so and everything will settle back out to normal. This doesn't happen often, only if your package is sitting out in the sun for a few hours.

templates.name: Do the NIRA Lasers use UV (ultraviolet) light therapy?

templates.name: What does "clean" mean? Are your products all-natural?
templates.content: Our products aren't 100% natural, although they're all primarily natural. We don't believe that natural inherently qualifies an ingredient as good, or that, conversely, synthetics are inherently bad. "Clean" means that our focus is on creating cosmetics that are free from harmful ingredients without compromising on performance, quality, or price-point. All of our ingredients, whether natural or synthetic, are rigorously researched for safety within the context of a particular formulation and selected based on serving a necessary function - such as pigmentation, preservation, or performance. "Clean" means you can be certain that over 1500+ toxic offenders that are known carcinogens, endocrine and hormone disruptors, allergens, and animal by-products will never be in our products. We know there are a lot of different brands throwing around lots of different words to describe their products, so we encourage our customers to thoroughly read ingredient labels and make educated decisions for themselves; for our part, we promise to always do the leg-work to ensure our ingredient lists are safe and transparent.

templates.name: Can I combine multiple of your products to give to my dog?
templates.content: Definitely! Most of our products are compatible with each other because they're made from safe, natural ingredients. We recommend not giving your dog too many of our chews that have hemp in them. For example, if you're combining our Hemp Mobility and our Hemp Calming, we recommend just giving one of them on a regular daily basis. We recommend giving lower amounts if more than one daily product contains probiotics (Digestive Probiotics, Allergy Skin Health Food Topper, Allergy Support, Allergy Skin Health, and more) to ensure that your dog is getting a balanced amount. We also don't recommend combining our Advanced Hip + Joint and Hemp Mobility products because they contain some of the exact same active ingredients.

templates.name: Can I give my dog multiple treats at once and every day?
templates.content: Our supplements were formulated to be complementary, so it's safe to give them to your pup on the same day. You could give them all of our products in a day if you wanted! That being said, we always recommend discussing with your veterinarian if you have any concerns, especially if your pup already takes medication or has a pre-existing health condition.

templates.name: Fit Issue - Bra band rides up
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! A bra band that rides up means the band is too big. If the band isn't parallel to the floor and is riding up, you can try a smaller band size. If it's not snug, then it'll start riding up. A correctly sized bra band will fit tight at first, but not uncomfortable, on the loosest set of hooks.

A headboard cannot be attached directly to the adjustable base. You can maintain that aesthetic with your bed in a couple of ways. 

The first option is to affix the headboard directly to the wall and place the bed in front of it. The second is to use a headboard and footboard connected by side rails. With most furniture like this, the adjustable base can be set down inside. We recommend measuring the inside dimensions to make sure there is enough room to accommodate the base.

templates.name: What does fill power mean?
templates.content: Fill power is a number that measures the fluffiness and quality of a down product, so it measures the amount of space one ounce of down will occupy in cubic inches. Higher fill power means the down will have better quality, higher loft, and will retain its firmness longer. This is because higher fill power means the down can trap more air which allows for greater insulation.

templates.name: What's the difference between your bamboo bed sheets and other brands?
templates.content: Our bamboo sheets are made of the world's first CleanBamboo, one of the most sustainable and innovative textile materials of the 21st century. Other bamboo beddings are made from either 100% bamboo viscose (also known as bamboo rayon), or 100% bamboo modal, which requires the use of harmful chemicals. Our patented CleanBamboo fabric is stronger and softer than bamboo rayon, free from harmful chemicals and requires less energy and water to produce. You can learn more about bamboo fabric blends here: https://ettitude.com/fabrics/not-bamboo-sheets-created-equal

templates.name: My dog doesn’t pull, is this still a good harness?
templates.content: Of course! Our harness isn't just made to alleviate or eliminate pulling, but it's a solution for dog owners that have a hard time getting other harnesses on their dog. It's easy on and easy off! That, and it's super comfortable for dogs to wear. Collars and other tight harnesses risk damage to the body like the trachea. If your dog isn't a puller, we recommend using the main D-ring on the back-center of the harness.

templates.name: Shelf life/Code Dates
templates.content:
Our Kids Meals, Finger Foods and Mighty Bites stay fresh for 6-7 days in your refrigerator depending on your delivery day. Our Superfood Smoothies stay fresh for a minimum of two weeks in your refrigerator (They're cold-pressed to keep them fresh!). See each product for the exact use by date on the packaging. Once you've opened a Kids Meal or Finger Food, we recommend consuming the food within 24 hours. Opened Mighty Bites should be consumed
within 4 days. Opened Superfood Smoothies should be consumed within 3 days.

templates.name: How do I change the APN setting (AT&T models)?
templates.content: With the camera in setup mode press the Menu button. Scroll to the fourth menu tab and then scroll down to Diagnostic. Choose APN Setting and enter the password, which is 123456 for 4G models and 1234 for 3G models. If you're using a Spartan SIM (solid white with the blue AT&T globe), the APN should be APNSP. If you are using an AT&T SIM (has some color on it), the APN should be either APNBR or APNBL. Choose whichever one it isn't.

templates.name: Will the Clip-In Bun show or be obvious to others?
templates.content:
Compared to other clip-in buns on the market, the Luxy Clip-In Bun is made of 100% remy human hair which is the best way to achieve a natural look. Our Clip-In Bun looks and feels real (because it is!) so it will blend naturally with your hair. Synthetic hair is generally stiff, coarse to the touch, shiny and moves differently from human hair which won't blend as well with your natural hair.

We went through multiple variations in the size of our Clip-In Buns before we landed on our finished product to ensure the bun isn't too large or overly bulky. We can say with full confidence that we designed the most natural-looking bun on the market!

templates.name: How do I clean my Hair Blow Dryer Brush?
templates.content:
Only clean your brush when it is off, unplugged, and cool to the touch. Start by removing all hair from the bristles - we like to use a teasing or 'rat-tail' comb to lift the hair up from the inner bristles out. If there appears to be product build-up, use a clean, lightly damp cloth or alcohol wipes to gently clean the inner barrel area and bristles. 

Lastly, remove lint, dust, and hair from the intake area at the base of the brush. You can use a firm-bristled brush to gently brush that away!

templates.name: Will your chargers work for iPhone 12 / iPhone 13?
templates.content:
The iPhone 12 and 13, while both Qi-compatible, have been found to be more sensitive to the
placement on wireless chargers than prior Apple models as they feature MagSafe functionality. This means that they require a little extra care when aligning the coils in the phone and in the charger perfectly. We've found from our customers that with a little extra effort, alignment becomes second
nature to ensure a good connection each time when setting your phone down to charge. Those newer models of iPhone have MagSafe wireless charging functionality which includes
magnets, so the placement does need to be a bit more precise on our chargers (which use Qi
technology) for the coils to sync up between the phone and charger surface.
Since MagSafe still supports Qi chargers, those devices will function with any existing Qi charging
mats like ours!

templates.name: I am allergic to traditional fragrances. Can I wear yours?
templates.content: We designed our fragrances to be hypoallergenic. We conducted Human Repeat Insult Patch Testing (HRIPT) on 200 subjects for each of our fragrances to determine their potential for irritation, sensitization, and allergic contact. The testing observed no skin reactivity, no skin irritation, or allergic contact dermatitis.  But the only way to be absolutely certain if you will have an allergic reaction is to test any fragrance on a small patch of your skin before using it, which we recommend. Everyone reacts differently to personal care and fragrance, so if you know you are sensitive or have any questions about allergies, we are here to answer questions.

templates.name: How do I measure my foot?
templates.content: Stand up straight on a hard surface with your heel against the wall and a piece of blank paper taped to the floor, flush against the wall beneath your foot. Have someone mark the longest part of your foot (referred to as heel-to-toe length) on the paper with a pen or pencil, or measure yourself if necessary. Repeat with the other foot, as right and left sizes may be different. Then use a ruler to measure the heel-to-toe length you marked for each foot.

templates.name: How do I avoid chipping?
templates.content:
Chipping always comes down to the prep! To make sure your mani can be long-lasting, make sure you're avoiding hand washing during the prep steps, and avoiding showering right before you paint, as water can cause your nail plate to expand! 

Remove polish with the Nail Polish Remover Pot, and avoid touching your hair, towels, etc so no oil can transfer to your nail bed. Then, paint in 2-3 thin coats while giving the coats at least 5-10 minutes of dry time in between. Seal with Super Glossy Top Coat and reapply every 2-3 days to really lock in the mani and keep it fresh! 

If you're still experiencing chipping after following these steps, add in Nail Primer to your routine before painting to help further dehydrate your nail plate.

templates.name: Why is it best to shave in the morning?
templates.content:
When we shave, we expose new skin and our face is left in a more sensitive state.  Your pillow and sheets can have residue from your lotion, detergent, or hair products that can irritate freshly shaved skin. This can cause bumps, itching, or other irritation.

We do strongly recommend shaving after a hot shower though. So if you normally shower at night only, we definitely recommend another quick preshave shower in the morning, or using hot towels before your shave to avoid shaving at night.

templates.name: Do whole grains help with incontinence?
templates.content: When your bowels aren't functioning properly and you feel bloated or are constipated, it can put pressure on your bladder, causing you to have to go to the bathroom more frequently. Foods that are rich in whole grains-such as brown rice and whole grain breads, pastas, and cereals-are also high in fiber, which helps keep your bowels healthy, thereby reducing bladder symptoms.

templates.name: How can I get mood/color changers to work?
templates.content:
Our mood changers change color based on temperature, so they change whether it's hot or cold. The bottom of the jar will show what the cold color is versus the hot color. You can test the colors by running your nails under hot or cold water. Please note that some of the shades can be a very subtle change. When we test mood changers in our lab, we use extremely hot water and extremely cold ice water to really see the change, this helps us make sure each "mood" is correct. This is why lukewarm water or your body temp may not show as much of a drastic change. While Sun Changers need a UV index of at least 4 in order for them to change. Please also note that if you are using the Gel Method, some brands of Gel liquids have "UV blockers" in their formula to prevent yellowing from the sun, this can also prevent the color change.
If you could follow up and provide a video of the manicure not changing that would be extremely helpful when we touch base with our Quality Control department to report your color complaint.

templates.content: Our products haven't changed, the feeling of the fabric may be different as the color of our dyes can affect how it feels. Were you to order comparable silk satin sheets you may experience a similar dulling, even when washing your bedding with extreme care. Usually, even though the sheen dulls a bit, the sheets maintain a very silky feel. In other words, the texture of our fabric is supposed to and will change slightly after the first wash. Do not let it sit in soapy water, as this can damage the enameled cast iron coating. If your cast iron product has any cooked-on bits of food you'd like to remove, you can deglaze it by simmering water with baking soda and breaking up any stubborn bits with the beechwood spatula.

templates.name: What is an electric car?
templates.content: An electric car - sometimes referred to as an EV (electric vehicle) or BEV (battery electric vehicle) - stores energy in rechargeable batteries, and uses those batteries to power one or more electric motors. The battery is charged using an external charger through a charging port, and also via a process called regenerative braking. Because EVs run on electricity, no gasoline is required, and they produce no tailpipe emissions. They also have fewer moving parts than gasoline vehicles, making them less complicated and, over time, less expensive to maintain.

Compostable products are designed for products that come in contact with food, such as our products themselves, but since our packaging will not be contaminated by food, recycling is a much more appropriate end-of-life option for our packaging.

We are working on making more of our product line packaging compostable, and are committed to continuing our work innovating cost-effective compostable packaging that's up to our performance standards. We hope to make all our packaging compostable soon.

templates.name: What is non-toxic polyester glitter?
templates.content:
Non-toxic polyester glitter (PET) is heat-resistant and solvent-resistant. PET is a high quality glitter that is made from a polyester fabric so it is pigmented throughout and will not fade or lose its sparkle. PET is a full coverage glitter and covers a larger surface area 10x more compared to craft glitter. Our glitter is compatible with resin, epoxy, slime, and more.

We offer a variety of cosmetic grade glitters, and coming soon is our biodegradable glitter line.

templates.name: Difference between CZ Stones (Cubic Zirconia) and Moissanites
templates.content:
You can check their differences below:

CZ Stones (Cubic Zirconia):
Made of cubic zirconium dioxide.
Less expensive than moissanites.
Good brilliance (sparkle) but less fire (color dispersion).
Relatively hard but can scratch more easily over time.

Moissanites:
Made of silicon carbide.
Slightly more expensive than CZ stones.
Excellent brilliance and fire, more colorful flashes of light.
Very hard, more resistant to scratching than CZ stones.
They pass the diamond tester.

templates.name: How often do you have to charge a hybrid car?
templates.content:
You don't actually need to charge a hybrid car. Thanks to the magic of regenerative braking, they can charge themselves. As soon as you lift your foot off the accelerator - and when you push down on the brake pedal - regenerative braking uses the electric motor to capture energy that would normally be dissipated as heat. In this situation, the electric motor actually works as a generator, and sends energy back to the battery - so it can be used to power the vehicle later. 

Plug-in hybrids, which have larger batteries than conventional hybrids, come with a charging cable. Depending on the model, some plug-in hybrids can drive somewhere between 25 and 60 miles on electric power alone, enough for many daily commutes. It's recommended that you recharge a plug-in hybrid overnight so that you can do as much of your driving as possible in electric mode.

templates.name: How can I calculate how many rolls of temporary wallpaper I will need?
templates.content:
First, you need to determine the length and width of the wall/surface area you are covering in feet. Calculate the total square footage of your surface by multiplying the length of your wall by the width of your wall. Each wallpaper style should have the dimensions for each roll, so you would use the following formula to decide how many rolls you need to purchase (remember to convert the dimensions from inches to feet if necessary!): 

Total square footage of your wall / total square footage of one wallpaper roll = number of rolls required

Keep in mind that you must round up to have enough wallpaper. For example, if your calculation came out to 1.42, you must round up and purchase 2 rolls of wallpaper to have enough material. Hope this helps!

templates.name: What is meant by "double or triple scenting" a candle?
templates.content: The industry standard is considered 0.5 ounces of fragrance per pound of wax. For double-scenting, you would use 1 ounce of fragrance per pound of wax. For triple-scenting your candles you can use 1.5 ounces of fragrance per pound of wax. Make sure to confirm the wax you're using will hold that much fragrance. Some waxes aren't designed to hold more than 1 ounce of fragrance per pound.

templates.name: How can I get the longest wear out of Londontown Gels?
templates.content:
Good question! There are two really key aspects to making any gel mani or pedi last longer:
1) Make sure the nail surface is totally clean and free of any leftover polish, debris or oils. To ensure your nails are completely prepped for gel application, we recommend using our Pre-Prep Nail Dehydrator which is formulated specifically to completely cleanse the nail and temporarily remove the natural oils our nails are constantly producing.

2) Create a surface ideal for polish to grip onto the nail. To do this, we recommend gently buffing the nail so that it has a gritty feel, not a totally smooth one and applying a coat of our non-acid bonding primer which strengthens the bonds between our gel base coat and the nail surface.

Wave Spray is a product for someone who has straight hair and wishes they had more texture and bend. Curly or wave hair types can use OUAI Wave Spray too when they want a hold factor and a thickening factor.

templates.name: What products can I use to clean the commix down couch?
templates.content:
The cushion covers of the Commix sectional are removable and can be thrown in the washing machine on a cold setting or hand-washed with soap and water.

The recommended cleaning for these types of fabrics would be to spot clean using the foam from a water-based cleaning agent. This could be a mild soap or detergent or a nonsolvent upholstery cleaner. You should always use a clean, dry white cloth or sponge and test an area that is less noticeable first. Blot the area dry and use the cool setting on a dryer to dry once the stain is removed. A fan also may be used. When spot-cleaning a chair cushion, clean the entire surface of the cushion.

templates.name: What is Bonded leather?
templates.content: Bonded leather is a combination of wipeable synthetic material and genuine leather. Gathre's bonded leather mats are beloved by many, because of the beauty and practicality of how these materials work together. The top is a layer of polyurethane, which makes it wipeable and water-resistant. The backside is a sturdy, textured leather material that works inside your home, and also in your backyard. Our bonded leather contains 72% PU leather and 28% genuine leather fibers.

templates.name: How is brilliant earth different from other retailers that claim they offer conflict free diamonds?
templates.content:
Brilliant Earth is most well-known for our Beyond Conflict Free standards, meaning we take it a step above and beyond the industry to make sure there are no human rights abuses, poverty, environmental degradation, and other issues at any of the mines we source from. All of our diamonds offer transparent views into the stone's origins. We use repurposed metal in the products we create.
 
Our select group of diamond suppliers demonstrate a robust chain of custody protocol for their diamonds and have the ability to track and segregate diamonds by origin. These suppliers are required to source diamonds that originate from specific mine operators who follow internationally recognized labor, trade, and environmental standards.

templates.name: How long is the lifetime of my battery/How long will the battery last?
templates.content:
The battery life varies usually from 2-3 years depending on the type of watch, its dimension,s and the amount of energy required by the different functions. For instance, a chronograph will have a higher energy consumption than a watch indicating the hours and minutes only. 

Some Luminox watches give a signal when the battery is almost exhausted. As soon as the second hand jumps in 4-second intervals, it's time to have the battery replaced by a Luminox-certified watchmaker. Even when this stage is reached, the watch will work for one to three weeks before it stops completely. Please note that the battery is not covered by the manufacturer's warranty.

templates.name: What is the difference between wild and farm-raised fish?
templates.content: Wild fish are caught in the ocean, in the most safe and sustainable way, while farm-raised fish are raised either in open ocean aquaculture or pristine land aquafarms. Wild fish eat whatever they can, and farmed fish are fed a regular diet; this impacts the fat content and nutritional profile of the fish. Some prefer to eat farmed salmon, for instance, because the fat improves flavor and texture. We offer both wild and farmed seafood to please every taste.

templates.name: How do I unbox my Nolah mattress?
templates.content:
Unboxing your Nolah mattress is fast and easy, so you can sleep in your new bed the day it arrives! However, mattresses are large items, so you should exercise caution while lifting, positioning, and unwrapping your mattress. We recommend two adults complete the setup process. Here's how to unbox your Nolah mattress step by step:

- Once the package arrives, bring it in and lay the box flat on the floor next to your bed frame or foundation. Open one end of the box, and pull out the mattress roll.
- With the plastic still on, lift the mattress roll and place it on top of your bed frame or foundation. Line it up with your base so the mattress has ample space to unroll and expand.
- Remove the outer layer of shrink wrap by hand. Before the next step, prepare for the mattress to unravel and expand quickly. Our mattresses are compressed for shipping, so they exert force as they unwrap.
- Use scissors to carefully cut open the inner layer of plastic wrap. As soon as air enters the wrap, the mattress will start to expand and flatten. Once it lays flat, shift the mattress to align it with your foundation if necessary.

templates.content:

templates.name: The red light on my LEVO C is still on even though I finished my infusion & activation
templates.content:
If the red light is still on on your LĒVO C after you've finished an Infuse or Activate Setting, don't fret! Here's the why your light is still on: 

1. When the red light is on on your LEVO C machine, the heat plate is still hot. 
2. The red light will turn off once your heat plate has cooled. 
3. Be careful not to touch the heat plate while the light is on.

templates.name: Do I have to download the app to use my Glow?
templates.content:
You can use your Glow with or without the app. To use, ensure the Glow is fully charged and flip it to turn on. The Glow will gradually dim over the next 45 minutes - but to pause, press the button on top! You can also use the Glow to move about at night. When dark, give it a swirl like you may with a glass of water and it'll emit a faint glow.

The Glow can be paired with an iOS app to unlock additional features such as creating Glow groups, scheduling a wake-up, and customizing the settings on your Glow to make it your own.

templates.name: Where are your products manufactured?

Serenol is composed of 2 primary ingredients - purified pollen extract derived from plants grown in southern Sweden, and chromium picolinate, produced in the US under current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP). Serenol is then manufactured in the USA by combining the two. templates.name: What's the difference between Polarized and Non-Polarized?
templates.content: Polarized lenses help reduce glare and enhance visual clarity. Polarization seeks to block out horizontal light that reflects from other surfaces, or light sources. It also helps ease eye strain from hours in the sun. Non-polarized lenses offer the same protection against UV rays as all of our shades. You may opt for non-polarized lenses because they make it difficult to see LCD screens, like your television, or tablet. They are also preferred for snow sports, and activities.

templates.name: it looks like my bottle has rust - is this normal?
templates.content:
Stainless steel contains chromium which, when exposed to oxygen in the atmosphere forms a thin invisible layer called chromium oxide. This invisible layer gives stainless steel its ability to resist stains and rust. If this layer is damaged, rust is formed on the surface at the point of that damage.

Removal of oxidized stains and even "surface rust" can be done by using a paste made from baking soda and water or a cleanser that contains oxalic acid, such as Bar Keeper's Friend Soft Cleanser. If using baking soda and water, use a cloth or soft bristle brush, and rub the baking soda in the direction of the grain. This may take a little effort, but this will remove these soils.

templates.name: Sustainability: How has Cozy Earth established its own proprietary supply chain?
templates.content: Our founder speaks fluent Mandarin Chinese and he, along with our team, has worked years to establish long-lasting relationships and trust with the most responsible and forward-thinking manufacturers on the planet. These hand-selected partners are at the forefront of luxury bedding. Because of this, Cozy Earth is the world's leader in responsibly sourced, authentic, high-quality viscose from bamboo textiles. We're able to guarantee that our process, working conditions, and products are reaching their potential in quality. The vast majority of other bedding companies just buy ready-made products through middlemen and trade companies. We at Cozy Earth believe this is doing the customer a disservice. Instead, we go to the lengths no one else will to ensure that what we do, and how we do it, is best in its category.

templates.name: How do I open my caviar?
templates.content: If you don't have a tin opener you can use the back part of a spoon or a knife. Insert the tin opener between the lid and the tin ridge and twist away from your body so that the 2 parts spread open. The tins are vacuum-sealed and require some effort to open.  If you don't have a tin opener when you place your next order, remind us and we'll be glad to send you one. You can check out this video for guidance: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iLSzIiMCAhs

templates.name: Are your products keto friendly?
templates.content:
All our products contain Cassava flour, which is high in resistant starch, a type of starch that
is not fully digested and has a low glycemic index. While they are not considered strictly keto,
many people experience a minimal to moderate blood sugar spike compared to traditional
breads. Carbohydrates sometimes have a negative reputation, but that is changing as we
become more knowledgeable about various types of starch. It's best to try them out and see
how your body responds to the resistant starches to determine if they fit your dietary needs.

templates.name: I ordered several times and all got cancelled
templates.content: Our fulfillment center doesn't share live inventory with us, so it's susceptible to hot items selling out before inventory levels are updated. Our warehouse is over 5-acres large and we stock a vast quantity of products, however there are times that your order will ship to you directly from the manufacturer. Even though our warehouse and our manufacturers' are very automated, there are times that inventory levels will be incorrect and we won't know this until your order is actually attempted to be filled by warehouse personnel. Sometimes items will be back-ordered or discontinued and manufacturers forget to notify their retailers, which is only discovered after you order that item and the warehouse personnel can't find it. We do our best to provide all the items you order, but there are simply times we can't and when this happens, naturally we'll refund you, and if possible, help you select an alternative item.

templates.name: What is deck height in a carrier housing?
templates.content: It's the measurement from the base of the housing to the gear teeth. This mounting surface within the housing changes to accommodate the smaller pinion gears that are used when swapping to numerically higher gear ratios. A taller deck height maintains proper contact between the ring and pinion gear teeth by moving the ring gear farther 'up' in the housing.

templates.name: How do I update my payment information?
templates.content:
You can update your payment information in your account settings. Please note that if you have one card in the system, you must add a new card and make it your default card before you will be able to remove your existing card.

To add a new card, sign in and go into your Account Settings. Click the arrow next to Payments, and then click Add Card. Once you've added a new card, you can choose to make it your default card. Don't forget to click the Save Changes button. 

Once you've added a new card and made it your default card, you will be able to delete your existing card by selecting the card, clicking Delete and then confirming by clicking the Delete button.

templates.name: How can I scan my face on the App?
templates.content:
To analyze your face in the NIRA app, you'll want to go to the "Results" tab instead of the "Analyze" tab. Here's how it works:

• Open the app and tap "Results."
• The app will show a guide - align your eyes to the guide. 
• The camera will automatically capture your face once it's positioned correctly.
• After the photo is taken, you can pinch and drag to fine-tune your eye alignment for the best analysis.
• This should give you the most accurate results. Make sure you're in good lighting and your face is fully visible.

templates.name: How does Heat Bank Technology work?
templates.content: The Grill's tubular oven chamber is designed with a highly conductive aluminum chassis. When set in the Sun, this channels heat into a thermal mass sitting underneath the Sliding Tray. When charged, the Heat Bank can be used to cook small meals without additional sunlight and cook evenly during the day.
